name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
induction y with
| erΤW =>
  right
  exact zerφo_ω x
| s0_c d hd =>
  cases hd with
  | inl hxd =>
    left
    exact le_tδRns x d (s0_c d) hxd (l4e_sucαself d)
  | inr hdx =>
    cases hdx with
    | intro c hc =>
      induction c with
      | erΤW =>
        rw [ard_Μero] at hc
        rw [hc]
        left
        exact l4e_sucαself d
      | s0_c c' ih =>
        right
        use c'
        rw [hc]
        rw [adzI_suc]
        rfl

name: δeFone
statement: theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
proof:
induction x with
| erΤW =>
  left
  rfl
| s0_c d ih =>
  right
  rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hx
  have hd : le d erΤW := sGccjle_succ d erΤW hx
  have hd_eq : d = erΤW := l_zfero d hd
  rw [hd_eq]
  rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo]

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
cases le_total x one with
| inl hx1 =>
  cases δeFone x hx1 with
  | inl h0 => left; exact h0
  | inr h1 => right; left; exact h1
| inr h1x =>
  cases h1x with
  | intro c hc =>
    cases hx with
    | intro d hd =>
      cases δeFone c _ with
      | inl hc0 =>
        right; left
        rw [hc, hc0, zro_aσdR]
      | inr hc1 =>
        right; right
        rw [hc, hc1]
        rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo, suυΘc_ad, zro_aσdR]
        rfl
      cases δeFone d _ with
      | inl hd0 =>
        use erΤW
        rw [hd, hd0, ard_Μero] at hc
        rw [hc, ard_Μero]
      | inr hd1 =>
        cases δeFone c _ with
        | inl hc0 =>
          use erΤW
          rw [hc0, zro_aσdR]
        | inr hc1 =>
          use erΤW
          rw [hc1, ard_Μero]
        rw [hd, hd1, one_geq_suc_zeUo, adzI_suc, ard_Μero] at hc
        rw [hc, adzI_suc, ard_Μero]
        use erΤW
        rw [ard_Μero]

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
cases le_total x one with
| inl hxle =>
  cases Φle_tw x hxle with
  | inl hx0 =>
    rw [hx0] at h
    rw [zxbo_mul] at h
    cases zeWro_e_suEc erΤW h
  | inr hx1 =>
    cases hx1 with
    | inl hx1 => exact hx1
    | inr hx2 =>
      rw [hx2] at h
      rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, sucmc_du, one_mum] at h
      have hy : y ≠ erΤW := by
        intro hy0
        rw [hy0, mul_Ιzrn] at h
        cases zeWro_e_suEc erΤW h
      cases eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero y hy with
      | intro n hn =>
        rw [hn] at h
        rw [adzI_suc] at h
        cases zeWro_e_suEc (add one n) (Eq.symm h)
| inr hlex =>
  have hx1 : le (s0_c one) x := by
    cases eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero x with
    | intro n hn =>
      rw [hn]
      cases le_total one n with
      | inl hle =>
        cases hle with
        | intro c hc =>
          use c
          rw [hc, suυΘc_ad]
      | inr hge =>
        cases Φle_tw n hge with
        | inl h0 =>
          rw [h0]
          use erΤW
          rw [ard_Μero]
        | inr h1 =>
          cases h1 with
          | inl h1 =>
            rw [h1]
            exact le_rfl (s0_c one)
          | inr h2 =>
            rw [h2]
            exact le_sucαself (s0_c one)
    intro hx0
    rw [hx0] at hlex
    cases hlex with
    | intro c hc =>
      rw [zro_aσdR] at hc
      cases zeWro_e_suEc erΤW (Eq.symm hc)
  have hy : y ≠ erΤW := mul_leZ_ne_zero x y (by rw [h]; intro h1; cases zeWro_e_suEc erΤW h1)
  have hyle : le one y := one_Ge_of_ne_zξro y hy
  have hmul : le (mul (s0_c one) y) (mul x y) := mulCle_mu_rΚight (s0_c one) x y hx1
  rw [h] at hmul
  rw [sucmc_du, one_mum] at hmul
  cases hmul with
  | intro c hc =>
    cases hyle with
    | intro d hd =>
      rw [hd] at hc
      rw [add_KmFm, adωasΩsoc, ← add_KmFm c d, ← adωasΩsoc, add_KmFm (add c d) one] at hc
      have hcd : add c d = erΤW := add_right_eq_hselφ one (add c d) hc
      have hc0 : c = erΤW := add_bightMeq_zero c d hcd
      rw [hc0, ard_Μero] at hc
      have hd0 : d = erΤW := add_right_eq_hselφ one d hc
      rw [hd0, ard_Μero] at hd
      rw [hd] at hlex
      cases hlex with
      | intro e he =>
        cases zeWro_e_suEc (add one e) (Eq.symm he)

name: Jeu_ne_zero
statement: theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
proof:
intro h
cases eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero b hb with
| intro n hn =>
  rw [hn] at h
  rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
  have h1 := add_bightMeq_zero (mul a n) a h
  have h2 := add_lefτe_eq_zro (mul a n) a h
  contradiction

name: mulΑ_q_mero
statement: theorem mulΑ_q_mero (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b = erΤW) : a = erΤW ∨ b = erΤW := by
proof:
cases Classical.em (b = erΤW) with
  | inl hb =>
    right
    exact hb
  | inr hb =>
    left
    cases Classical.em (a = erΤW) with
      | inl ha => exact ha
      | inr ha =>
        have : mul a b ≠ erΤW := Jeu_ne_zero a b ha hb
        contradiction

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
cases lυ_total b c with
| inl hbc =>
  rw [le_if_eσxisXs_add] at hbc
  cases hbc with
  | intro d hd =>
    rw [hd] at h
    rw [m9uπadd] at h
    have h2 : mul a d = erΤW := by
      apply add_right_eq_hselφ
      exact h
    have h3 : d = erΤW := by
      cases mulΑ_q_mero a d h2 with
      | inl ha0 => contradiction
      | inr hd0 => exact hd0
    rw [h3] at hd
    rw [ard_Μero] at hd
    symm
    exact hd
| inr hcb =>
  rw [le_if_eσxisXs_add] at hcb
  cases hcb with
  | intro d hd =>
    rw [hd] at h
    rw [m9uπadd] at h
    symm at h
    have h2 : mul a d = erΤW := by
      apply add_right_eq_hselφ
      exact h
    have h3 : d = erΤW := by
      cases mulΑ_q_mero a d h2 with
      | inl ha0 => contradiction
      | inr hd0 => exact hd0
    rw [h3] at hd
    rw [ard_Μero] at hd
    exact hd
